abilities.name: Psymimic
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, instead of Alakazam's normal attack, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attack. Alakazam copies that attack including its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type that Pokémon is, Alakazam's type is still Psychic.) This power can't be used if Alakazam is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Syncroblast
attacks.effect: If Alakazam and the Defending Pokémon don't have the same number of Energy cards on them, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 80.

abilities.name: Energy Connect
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), you make take one basic Energy cards attached to one of your Benched Pokémon and attach it to your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Ampharos is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Lightning Strike
attacks.effect: You may discard all Energy cards attached to Ampharos. If you do, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 40.

attacks.name: Poison Spray
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Poison Reaction
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Jet Stream
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Blastoise is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to Blastoise, if any. Then, if there are any Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon, choose one of them and discard it. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Energy Cannon
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

abilities.name: Miraculous Powder
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Butterfree is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 2 damage counters from Butterfree.

abilities.name: Burning Energy
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may turn all basic Energy attached to all of your Pokémon into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Scorching Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If 1 of them is tails, discards 3 Energy cards attached to Charizard. If both of them are tails, discard all Energy cards attached to Charizard.

abilities.name: Moonlight
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may put a card from your hand back on your deck. If you do so, search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Clefable is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Auto Fire
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Dragonite is on your Bench, you may reduce your Active Pokémon's Retreat cost to 0.

attacks.name: Dragon Tail
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Magnitude
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during you opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Supersonic Flight
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Major Tsunami
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Feraligatr is your Active Pokémon and if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon. Either way, if you have any Benched Pokémon, switch Feraligatr with 1 of them. This power can't be used if Feraligatr is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Rending Jaws
attacks.effect: If there are no damage counters on the Defending Pokémon, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 70.

abilities.name: Chaos Move
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), if your opponent has 3 or fewer Prizes, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon (yours or your opponent's) to another (even if it would Knock Out the other Pokémon). This power can't be used if Gengar is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hide in Shadows
attacks.effect: Switch Gengar with one of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Rock Body
abilities.effect: All Damage done by attacks to Golem is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rock Tumble
attacks.effect: Don't apply Resistance.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Giant Claw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Terraforming
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck and rearrange them as you like. This power can't be used if Machamp is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Iron Fist
attacks.effect: Count the number of Pokémon you have in play with damage counters on them. Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each of those Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Catch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put a basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

abilities.name: Soothing Aroma
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon that has any. This power can't be used if Meganium is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Super Psywave
attacks.effect: Choose one of you opponent's Pokémon. Count the number of Energy cards attached to that Pokémon. Put that many damage counters on the Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hypnosis
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mislead
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Ethereal Flame
attacks.effect: Discard all R Energy cards attached to Ninetales. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each cards discarded this way.

attacks.name: Energy Patch
attacks.effect: Take an Energy card attached to one of your Pokémon and attach it to another of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Beating Wings
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), If Pidgeot is your Active Pokémon, you may shuffle 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it in your deck. This power can't be used if Pidgeot is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Sharp Beak
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Plunge
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Poliwrath is on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, take all Energy cards attached to your Active Pokémon, if any, and attach them to Poliwrath. Then switch Poliwrath with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Water Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the amount of W Energy cards attached to Poliwrath. This attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.effect: If there are any Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads, attach one of them to Raichu.

attacks.name: Shock Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard all L Energy cards attached to Raichu or this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Steel Beak
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Air Cutter
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Heat Up
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), You may count the total number of Energy cards attached to all of your Pokémon and all of your opponent's Pokémon. If your opponent has more total energy cards attached, you may search your deck for 1 Fire Energy card and attach it to one of your Benched Pokémon, if any. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

abilities.name: Dark Aura
abilities.effect: All Energy attached to Tyranitar is Dark instead of its usual type.

attacks.name: Stamp
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 10 more damage and does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon, if any. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Harvest Bounty
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), If you attach an Energy card from your hand to your Active Pokémon as part of your turn, you may attach an additional Energy card to that Pokémon at the same time. This power can't be used if Venusaur is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Poison Pollen
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Vileplume is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Petal Dance
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Vileplume is now Confused.

attacks.name: Foul Gas
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Misfire
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, put 6 damage counters on Weezing.
